review: Very good product. I recommend it to anyone with a smart TV. Thanks Amazon!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Pretty happy with it overall. Great price and pretty comparable to a Roku. Audio is a little strange at times, but it could be caused by my TV as well.
author: A. Lott "AshleyMarkus"

review: This does not work with my HD Samsung TV...no matter how much I troubleshoot it still says "not supported mode". Waste of money. I was really excited to use this.
author: Christina Vaughan

review: Graphics and power for the price is awsome. I use it to mirror my Note 4 with. So far all great. Going to try airplay app I'v heard about so I can mirror Ipad's without being out $99 for an Apple TV.
author: Louis in Atlanta

review: I was lead to understand, from the advertising, that the Fire Stick was portable and could be taken with me when I travelled. I tried it this week and it did not work.Works great at home.
author: B. Tillmon

review: The fire stick has been working out great, I love that the apps are available on it. It helps that my wireless router is close to my TV and I don't have a signal issue.
author: Nadia

review: Love it ! Super easy to install and use.
author: lulu garcia
